$BaseCalendar.day-done-balance: All done for today. Balance of the day:
$BaseCalendar.month-balance-title: Balance up until today for this month. A positive balance means extra hours you don't need to work today (or the rest of the month).
$BaseCalendar.overall-balance-title: Overall balance until end of the month or current day

$Menu.confirm-clear-all-data: Are you sure you want to clear all the data?
$Menu.confirm-import-db: Are you sure you want to import a database? It will override any current information.
$Menu.fresh-start-confirm: Are you sure you want a fresh start?
$Menu.migrate-calendar-to-flexible: Migrate fixed calendar database to flexible
$Menu.should-migrate-to-flexible:
One of the new features of this Time to Leave release is a flexible number of entries for the calendar.

This new view uses a new database format.
To use it, you can either migrate your existing database to the new format or make a fresh start.

$Notification.time-to-leave: Hey there! I think it's time to leave.
